item.title: 有了这样的人工智能朋友，谁还需要人类？
item.description:
数字伴侣可不断提供共鸣。这将深刻改变我们一生中的人际关系。【原文：

Digital companions offer constant empathy. That could profoundly change the relationships we have over the course of our lives.

】

item.title: 特朗普冻结援助，10 亿美元非洲矿产项目面临风险
item.description:
美国在非洲最大的战略性关键矿产项目的扩建面临风险。【原文：

An expansion of the US's biggest strategic critical-minerals project in Africa is at risk.

】

item.title: 日产 CDS 升至日本最高，超过乐天和软银
item.description: 在与本田汽车公司的合并谈判终止后，日产汽车公司的信用违约掉期扩大至日本公司之最，超过了乐天集团和软银集团公司。【原文：Nissan Motor Co.’s credit-default swaps widened to the most among Japanese companies, overtaking both Rakuten Group Inc. and SoftBank Group Corp. after its consolidation talks with Honda Motor Co. were terminated.】

item.title: 受央行胃口影响，高盛将黄金目标价上调至 3100 美元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）将年底黄金目标上调至每盎司3,100美元，原因是央行买盘和资金流入金银支持的交易所交易基金，凸显了华尔街对黄金的热情。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. raised its year-end gold target to $3,100 an ounce on central-bank buying and inflows into bullion-backed exchange-traded funds, highlighting Wall Street’s enthusiasm for the metal.】

item.title: 三菱汽车因本田愿意与日产进行更多谈判的消息而上扬
item.description: 有报道称，如果本田汽车公司首席执行官内田诚（Makoto Uchida）下台，该公司将愿意重启与陷入困境的日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.【原文：Shares of Mitsubishi Motors Corp. surged as much as 8.6%, the most in two months, after a report that Honda Motor Co. would be willing to restart talks on a potential tie-up with ailing peer Nissan Motor Co. if its CEO Makoto Uchida steps down.】

item.title: 澳大利亚将关键利率降至 4.1%，通胀接近目标
item.description: 随着通胀率接近其 2-3% 目标的上限，澳大利亚央行自 2020 年以来首次下调利率，同时表示将对任何进一步的宽松政策采取谨慎态度。【原文：Australia’s central bank cut interest rates for the first time since 2020 as inflation approaches the top of its 2-3% target, while signaling a cautious approach to any further easing.】

item.title: DeepSeek 正在为中国气象局的预报提供支持
item.description: 中国国家气象局正在考虑使用 DeepSeek（一家本地初创公司，其人工智能模型上个月震动了全球市场）来支持其预报和观测工作。【原文：China’s state weather agency is considering using DeepSeek, the local startup whose artificial intelligence model shook global markets last month, to power its forecasts and observations.】

item.title: 澳大利亚自 2020 年以来首次下调主要利率
item.description: 2024年11月28日星期四，澳大利亚悉尼，澳大利亚储备银行（RBA）行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）在澳大利亚经济发展委员会（CEDA）会议上发表讲话。布洛克表示，澳大利亚的核心通胀率 "过高"，短期内无法考虑降息，并重申在物价持续回归目标值之前还有一段路要走。摄影师布伦特-莱温/布鲁姆伯格【原文：Michele Bullock, governor of the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA), speaks at the Committee for Economic Development of Australia (CEDA) conference in Sydney, Australia, on Thursday, Nov. 28, 2024. Australia’s core inflation is “too high” to consider interest-rate cuts in the near term, Bullock said, reiterating that there’s still some way to go before prices return sustainably to target. Photographer: Brent Lewin/Bloomberg】

item.title: 中国可转债吸引投资者扩大人工智能赌注
item.description: 由 DeepSeek 引发的中国投资者对人工智能相关资产的热情已蔓延到可转换债券，使基准指数达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：Chinese investors’ zeal for artificial intelligence-related assets fanned by DeepSeek has spread to convertible bonds, sending a benchmark index to its highest in more than two years.】

item.title: LG 启动 15 亿美元印度首次公开募股路演活动
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，LG 电子公司已开始路演，以会见其印度子公司首次公开募股的潜在投资者。【原文：LG Electronics Inc. has started roadshows to meet potential investors in the initial public offering of its Indian unit, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美元上涨拖累印度股市，企业加大对冲力度
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 越南批准全面改革以刺激经济增长
item.description: 越南议会正式批准了一项数十年来最大规模的政府改革计划，此举将削减数千个工作岗位，并从根本上精简臃肿的官僚机构，以努力实现雄心勃勃的增长目标。【原文：Vietnam’s parliament formally approved a plan for the biggest government overhaul in decades, a move that will slash thousands of jobs and radically streamline a bloated bureaucracy in an effort to pursue ambitious growth targets.】

item.title: 习近平誓言支持私营部门，中国股市扩大涨幅
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平与知名企业家会面后，香港中资股走高，表明中国政府支持私营企业。【原文：Chinese stocks in Hong Kong edged higher after a meeting between President Xi Jinping and prominent entrepreneurs signaled Beijing’s endorsement of the private sector.】

item.title: 中国政府债券因现金紧缩和股市乐观而下跌
item.description: 中国政府债券收益率上升，原因是本地市场资金紧张，股市反弹削弱了对债务的需求。【原文：China’s government bond yields rose as tight cash conditions in the local market and a rally in stocks sapped the demand for debt.】

item.title: 维珍航空超越澳航成为澳大利亚最大的国内航空公司
item.description: 去年年底，维珍澳大利亚航空公司（Virgin Australia）超越澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways Ltd.），成为澳大利亚最大、最可靠的航空公司，这给这家大型航空公司敲响了警钟，也为其可能重返股市提供了支持。【原文：Virgin Australia overtook Qantas Airways Ltd. to become Australia’s largest and most reliable airline at the end of last year, sending a warning to the marquee carrier and supporting a potential return to the stock market.】

item.title: 米磊首次为加密货币灾难辩护，否认有不当行为
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统首次就加密货币丑闻发表讲话，该丑闻损害了他在阿根廷的声誉，引发了诉讼，甚至有人要求弹劾他。【原文：President Javier Milei spoke out for the first time about a cryptocurrency scandal that’s dented his reputation in Argentina, triggering lawsuits and even calls for his impeachment.】

item.title: 淡马锡支持的印度肉类销售商寻求 20 亿美元的首次公开募股估值
item.description: Licious是淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte）支持的一家印度肉类和海鲜在线销售商，该公司正努力实现盈利，准备在2026年上市。【原文：Licious, a Temasek Holdings Pte-backed online seller of meat and seafood in India, is seeking to become profitable as it prepares to list in 2026, adding to a slew of consumer-facing firms eyeing the country’s public markets.】

item.title: 石油保持升势，欧佩克+可能推迟增加供应
item.description: 由于欧佩克+代表称该组织正在考虑推迟恢复产量，以及乌克兰无人机袭击了俄罗斯的一个原油泵站，石油在上涨后趋于平稳。【原文：Oil steadied after an advance as OPEC+ delegates said the group was considering delaying restoring output, and Ukrainian drones attacked a crude-pumping station in Russia.】

item.title: 财报在即，百度股价大幅跑输大盘成焦点
item.description: 百度公司将于周二发布的财报可能会为投资者提供线索，让他们知道这家中国互联网搜索行业的领头羊股价表现落后是否有理由。【原文：Results due Tuesday from Baidu Inc. may provide investors clues on whether the Chinese internet search leader’s lagging share price performance is warranted or not.】

item.title: SBI 支持的日本机器人顾问公司 Folio 目标是扭亏为盈和首次公开募股
item.description: 日本机器人顾问公司Folio Holdings Co.首席执行官Shinichiro Kai在接受采访时表示，这家由SBI Holdings Inc.支持的初创公司正在寻求上市，以便在一个急需扩张的市场中实现盈利。【原文：Japanese robo-adviser Folio Holdings Co. is looking to go public as the SBI Holdings Inc.-backed startup zeros in on profitability in a market primed for expansion, Chief Executive Officer Shinichiro Kai said in an interview.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒尔赞成暂停降息直至通胀回落
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）表示，近期的经济数据支持按兵不动，但如果通胀表现与2024年一样，决策者可以 "在今年的某个时候 "重新开始降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said recent economic data support keeping interest rates on hold, but if inflation behaves as it did in 2024, policymakers can get back to cutting “at some point this year.”】

item.title: 欧洲股市上涨后，亚洲股市走高：市场综述
item.description: 在欧洲，增加军费开支的可能性提升了国防公司的股价和债券收益率。【原文：Stocks in Asia are broadly set to track gains in Europe, where the likelihood of greater military spending lifted shares in defense companies and bond yields.】

item.title: 前员工称印度最大的 IT 公司在玩弄美国签证系统
item.description:
最新数据显示了 TCS 如何大量使用为管理人员保留的工作签证。前员工称这是为了规避 H-1B 规定。【原文：

New data show how TCS makes heavy use of employment visas reserved for managers. Ex-staffers say it was to get around H-1B rules.

】

item.title: 日本历史性的利率调整为信贷市场注入了动力
item.description: 日本企业债券市场正在蓬勃发展，因为经济反弹和在利率上调前抢占先机的计划鼓励了大量债券发行。【原文：Japan’s corporate bond market is booming, as an economic rebound and plans to get ahead of higher interest rates encourage a flurry of issuance.】

item.title: 必和必拓上半年利润下滑 23%，矿商削减股息
item.description: 必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）上半年利润同比下滑 23%，该矿业巨头受到中国对铁矿石和铜等主要大宗商品需求下降的影响。【原文：BHP Group Ltd.’s first-half profit slumped 23% from the year before, with the mining giant impacted by falling Chinese demand for key commodities including iron ore and copper.】

item.title: 泰国航空公司计划将机队规模扩大一倍，摆脱债务困扰
item.description: 在泰国国际航空公司（Thai Airways International Pcl）申请破产保护五年后，这家国有控股航空公司的法院指定债务管理人 Piyasvasti Amranand 正计划积极进行国际扩张。【原文：Five years after Thai Airways International Pcl filed for bankruptcy protection, the state-controlled carrier’s court-appointed debt administrator Piyasvasti Amranand is planning an aggressive international expansion.】

item.title: 澳大利亚养老金重投地方债务，成为贸易战避风港
item.description: 经过多年的海外投资后，澳大利亚一些最大的养老基金正在国内购买更多的政府债券；在贸易战风险扰动市场的情况下，这些基金现在认为政府债券是最安全的资产之一。【原文：After years of venturing offshore, some of Australia’s biggest pension funds are scooping up more government bonds at home — assets they now deem among the safest as trade-war risks rattle markets.】

item.title: 新加坡准备在大选年增加支出
item.description: 在全球不确定性加剧、国内成本上升的情况下，新加坡很可能在黄遵宪担任总理后的首份预算案中增加支出，在大选前向家庭和企业提供更多援助。【原文：Singapore is likely to boost spending in Lawrence Wong’s first budget as prime minister, offering more handouts to households and businesses ahead of election at a time of heightened global uncertainty and elevated costs at home.】

item.title: OpenAI 联合创始人 Sutskever 的初创公司正在以 300 亿美元以上的估值进行融资
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，OpenAI 联合创始人伊利亚-苏茨克沃（Ilya Sutskever）正在为他的初创公司筹集超过 10 亿美元的资金，估值超过 300 亿美元。【原文：OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever is raising more than $1 billion for his startup at a valuation of over $30 billion, according to a person familiar with the matter — vaulting the nascent venture into the ranks of the world’s most valuable private technology companies.】

item.title: 前 Pimco 高管准备推出全球首只巨灾债券 ETF
item.description: 近年来，巨灾债券的回报率一直高于高收益债务市场，现在即将有更多的投资者可以购买巨灾债券。【原文：Catastrophe bonds, whose returns have consistently trounced those of high-yield debt markets in recent years, are about to become accessible to a wider group of investors.】
